PieChart.js is a lightweight JavaScript library for rendering customizable pie charts using the HTML5 Canvas API. It provides smooth animations, color customization, and easy-to-use configurations for developers.
The JavaScript Calculator project is a simple web-based calculator that allows users to perform basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
